item.description:
Sorry All,

It was just brought to my attention that this event "disappeared" from the Meetup site! I assure you that it is still happening...please come & enjoy yourselves (& others) at our bi-monthly gathering at the Gaslight. Enjoy the commardarie, conversations & coffee (and a selection of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea and a sweet ala Julia Child ...all for $9.95 (exclusive of taxes & gratuity)).

Guests are responsible for their own bill...Paypal is not accepted for this event.

FREE parking adjacent to the Gaslight!

 

This may be the last Sunday Brunches at the Gaslight for a while, so let's go out in style!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in our own section at the rear of the restaurant
item.name: Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight
